title: Did Aba's letter prove that anyone making COVID-19 masks could beat him?
subtitle: A letter falsely attributed to the Ohio State Bar Association made some questionable allegations.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In July 2020, it was reported that a letter from the Ohio State Bar Association was accurate, stating that any retailer or manufacturer - including those working from home - could be sued for selling or creating COVID-19 face masks that were not medically approved, defective or without proper marking.
